name: stb-dashboard-server
description: bulk setup wifi setting over node-ssh

scripts.bundle: yarn install && tsc && yarn install --production && node_modules/.bin/caxa --exclude "./.git**" ".idea**" "./setting**" "./logs**" "armbian-monitor**" "./stb**" "./src**" "*.lock" "files**" ".idea**" "./node_modules/caxa**" "./node_modules/rx**" "./node_modules/date**" "./node_modules/ts**" "./node_modules/eslint**" "./node_modules/@types**" "./node_modules/typescript**" --input . --output "./armbian-monitor" -- "{{caxa}}/node_modules/.bin/node" "{{caxa}}/dist"
scripts.bundle-win: yarn install && tsc && yarn install --production && node_modules/.bin/caxa --exclude "./.git**" ".idea**" "./setting**" "./logs**" "armbian-monitor**" "./stb**" "./src**" "*.lock" "files**" ".idea**" "./node_modules/caxa**" "./node_modules/rx**" "./node_modules/date**" "./node_modules/ts**" "./node_modules/eslint**" "./node_modules/@types**" "./node_modules/typescript**" --input . --output "./armbian-monitor.exe" -- "{{caxa}}/node_modules/.bin/node" "{{caxa}}/dist"
scripts.deploy: pm2 stop all && yarn bundle-win && docker compose up
